dct_alternative_sm: Dimidia tribus Manasse hoc est, ea Terrae Sanctae pars, quam manafsae tribus in regionis diuisione obtinuit
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miliaria vnius horae".
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a ship, buildings, and people.
Sites of interest are numbered (key is not present).
